document_data.name: Jade River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Jade River''', a portion of which was later named the ''Barren River'',
document_data.Geography: It began in the western peaks of the [[Riders to the Sky]] mountain range and flowed westward, south of the city [[Mordulkin]], before emptying into the [[Bay of Chessenta]].
document_data.Description:
The green waters of the Jade River rushed down the mountainside before leveling out and flowing lazily across the plains of Threskel.

The river's color originated was caused by both naturally-forming [[algae]] and industrial waste caused by [[duergar|dwarven]] mines in the Riders' mountains.
document_data.History: After the landscape of Threskel changed following the events of the [[Spellplague]] in the {{YearlinkName|1384}}, the Jade River became no more. A massive plateau erupted from the plains, creating a small lake known as the [[Jade Pond]] and a much smaller waterway that share the Jade's mouth at the Bay of Chessenta, known as the ''Barren River''.{{Cite dungeon/178/Backdrop: Chessenta|72}}
